existing_features.title: Add keyboard shortcuts for quick navigation between main sections: Ctrl+1 for Dairy, Ctrl+2 for Transactions, Ctrl+3 for Settings
Add keyboard shortcuts within Dairy section to navigate between tabs: Ctrl+M for Milk Collection, Ctrl+B for Bill, Ctrl+D for Data Reports, Ctrl+S for Sell, Ctrl+C for Cash
Implement Enter key submission for all forms including Milk Collection, Cash transactions, product sales, farmer management, rate settings, and inventory updates
Add Escape key support to close all dialogs and modals including Milk Collection preview, farmer add/edit dialogs, inventory dialogs, and cancel ongoing operations
Add Tab and Shift+Tab support for logical focus order through all interactive elements in forms, tables, and navigation components
Add keyboard shortcut Ctrl+P to trigger print/PDF generation for bills and transaction history when viewing those sections
Add visual focus indicators with clear outlines on all interactive elements including buttons, inputs, tabs, and table rows to show keyboard focus state
Add keyboard shortcut help overlay accessible via '?' key that displays all available shortcuts organized by section
Add arrow key navigation for selecting farmers in search results and transaction lists
Add keyboard shortcut Ctrl+F to focus the search input in Transactions section and Farmer Management

new_feature_requests.summary: Add keyboard navigation and shortcuts for easy keyboard-only usage
